casebody.data:
Thursday, February 13, 1997

MOTION DOCKET

95-2591. Sharon Village Ltd. v. Licking Cty. Bd. of Revision.

Board of Tax Appeals, No. 94-M-1214. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Board of Tax Appeals. Upon consideration of the amicus curiae motion to participate in oral argument scheduled for February 19,1997,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that counsel for the Institute of Property Taxation and the National Council of Property Tax Consultants may present argument within the time allotted to appellant pursuant to S.Ct. Prac.R. IX(5).
